Topic.Title: Help: A timer code that automatically proceeds to the next passage.

Posts.EditableText:
I have a question. Is there a valid code for a timer that automatically goes to the next passage or link?
(For Example:

[[Link-01]]:

5 sec timer
- After 5 secs will automatically take you to Link 02

[[Link-02]]:
- Your time is up.)
Posts.HTML:
I have a question. Is there a valid code for a timer that automatically goes to the next passage or link?
(For Example:

[[Link-01]]:

5 sec timer

  • After 5 secs will automatically take you to Link 02

[[Link-02]]:

  • Your time is up.)

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

```
[[Link-01]]:
        setTimeout(function(){ squiffy.story.go("Link-02"); }, 5000);
After 5 secs will automatically take you to Link 02
[[Link-02]]:
Your time is up.
```
Posts.HTML:
Hello!

[[Link-01]]:
        setTimeout(function(){ squiffy.story.go("Link-02"); }, 5000);
After 5 secs will automatically take you to Link 02
[[Link-02]]:
Your time is up.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks! That helps a lot! One more thing. What about the timer display code?
Posts.HTML: Thanks! That helps a lot! One more thing. What about the timer display code?
